elements.name: DM_SAVE_HOME
elements.description: Overrides the save directory when using sys.get_save_file()

elements.name: DM_SERVICE_PORT
elements.description:
Overrides the engine service port, when creating the internal http server (e.g web profiler)
Valid values are integers between [0, 65535] and the string "dynamic" (which translates to 0).
Default value is 8001.

elements.name: DM_QUIT_ON_ESC
elements.description: Enables quitting the app directly by pressing the ESCAPE key. Set to "1" to enable this feature.

elements.name: DM_LOG_PORT
elements.description:
Enables receiving the log on a designated port (e.g. using telnet)
Valid values are integers between [0, 65535]

elements.name: --verify-graphics-calls=
elements.description: Disables OpenGL error checking. This is especially beneficial for running debug builds in the Chrome browser, in which the calls to glGetError() is notoriously slow. Default value is "true" for debug builds, and "false" for release builds.

elements.name: launch_project
elements.description:
Launch the engine with a specific project file
If no project is specified, it will default to "./game.projectc", "build/default/game.projectc"
notes: It has to be the first argument

elements.name: --config=
elements.description: Override game properties with the format --config=section.key=value
